title: Foreign travel advice
description: Latest travel advice by country including safety and security, entry requirements, travel warnings and health

countries.name: Afghanistan
countries.change_description: Latest update: Summary - on 26 October 2015 a serious earthquake struck causing casualties around the country and affecting communications networks; if someone you know is likely to have been involved and you're unable to contact them, contact the British Embassy in Kabul

countries.name: Austria
countries.change_description: Latest update: Summary – there’s ongoing disruption to rail and road transport; you should monitor local media and check with your transport provider or the Austrian Railways (OBB) website

countries.name: Finland
countries.change_description: Latest update: Summary – removal of advice on Northern Ireland football match

countries.name: India
countries.change_description: Latest update: Summary – removal of advice on Assam floods and the curfew in Srinagar

countries.name: Malaysia
countries.change_description: Latest update: Summary - haze can cause disruption to local, regional air travel and to government and private schools

countries.name: Spain
countries.change_description: Latest update: Summary – information and advice for Manchester City fans travelling to Seville
